lg.l: The shades of night were falling fast ,
As through an Eastern village passed
A youth who bore , through dust and heat ,
A stencil-plate , that read complete — “ SAPOLIO . ”
[ Illustration ]

body.p: CLEAN PAINT , OIL CLOTHS , FLOORS , WOOD WORK , TABLES & SHELVES WITH SAPOLIO .

lg.l: His brow was sad , but underneath ,
White with “ Odonto ” shone his teeth ,
And through them hissed the words , “ Well , blow
Me tight if here is ‘ ary show ! ” “ SAPOLIO . ”
[ Illustration ]

body.p: WASH DISHES , PORCELAIN , CHINA & GLASS WARE WITH SAPOLIO .

lg.l: On household fences , gleaming bright ,
Shone “ Gargling Oil , ” in black and white ,
Once “ Bixby 's Blacking ” stood alone ,
He straight beside it clapped his own — “ SAPOLIO . ”
[ Illustration ]

body.p: POLISH MILK CANS & PANS AND ALL KINDS OF TIN WARE WITH SAPOLIO .

lg.l: “ Try not my fence , ” the old man said ,
“ With ‘ Mustang Liniment ’ ‘ tis spread ,
Another vacant spot thar aint . ”
He answered with a dash of paint — “ SAPOLIO . ”
[ Illustration ]

body.p: CLEAN STEEL KNIVES & FORKS AND ALL METALLIC TOOLS AND UTENSILS WITH SAPOLIO .

lg.l: “ O , stay , ” the maiden said , “ A rest
Pray give us ! What with ‘ Bixby 's Best , ’
And ‘ Simmons ’ Pills , ’ we 're like to die . ”
He only answered , “ Will you try — SAPOLIO ? ”
[ Illustration ]

body.p: CLEAN BATH TUBS , WASH BASINS AND SINKS WITH SAPOLIO .

lg.l: “ Beware them peaks ! That wall so bright
Is but a snow bank , gleaming white ,
Your paint wont stick ! ” Came the reply ,
“ I 've done it ! ‘ How is that for high ? ’ ” “ SAPOLIO . ”
[ Illustration ]

body.p: SCOUR POTS , KETTLES , PANS & ALL BRASS & COPPER UTENSILS WITH SAPOLIO .

lg.l: One Sabbath morn , as heavenward
White Mountain tourists slowly spurred ,
On ev'ry rock , to their dismay ,
They read that legend strange , alway — “ SAPOLIO ”
[ Illustration ]

body.p: CLEAN GLASS WARE , WINDOWS , PORCELAIN & CHINA WARES WITH SAPOLIO .

lg.l: There on the summit , old and fat ,
Shameless , but vigorous , he sat ,
While on their luggage as they passed ,
He checked that word , from first to last , “ SAPOLIO . ”
[ Illustration ]

body.p: CLEAN MARBLE TABLES , FLOORS , STATUARY AND HARD FINISHED WALLS WITH SAPOLIO .
